verses.name: Luke 20:42
verses.text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms, The Lord said unto my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand,

verses.name: Luke 20:43
verses.text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool.

verses.name: Luke 20:44
verses.text: David therefore calleth him Lord, how is he then his son?

verses.name: Luke 20:45
verses.text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples,

verses.name: Luke 20:46
verses.text: Beware of the scribes, which desire to walk in long robes, and love greetings in the markets, and the highest seats in the synagogues, and the chief rooms at feasts;

verses.name: Luke 20:47
verses.text: Which devour widows’ houses, and for a shew make long prayers: the same shall receive greater damnation.
